sf_scp.midnightconfig.title: Can You Survive Config
sf_scp.midnightconfig.biomeConfig:
§c§l§n[!]§7§o If you want to change the biomes entities are in, you must do so with a §c§l§nDATA PACK.§7§o Their files are located under §9§o'sf_scp:tags/worldgen/biome/has_<entity>.json'

§7§oTo §c§l§nREMOVE§7§o entities from spawning in certain biomes, add biomes to §9§o'sf_scp:tags/worldgen/biome/blacklist/<entity>_blacklist.json'

§c§oYour game must be restarted and new chunks must be loaded to take effect.
sf_scp.midnightconfig.blacklistConfig: §7§oTo §c§l§nREMOVE§7§o entities from spawning in certain biomes, add biomes to §9§o'sf_scp:tags/worldgen/biome/blacklist/<animal>_blacklist.json'
sf_scp.midnightconfig.frankSpawnWeight.t: §8§o[?]§7§o The chance of Barbarian's spawning in the world.
sf_scp.midnightconfig.frankSpawnMinGroup: §8§o[?]§7§o The minimum number of Barbarian's that can spawn in a group.
sf_scp.midnightconfig.frankSpawnMaxGroup: §8§o[?]§7§o The maximum number of Barbarian's that can spawn in a group.
sf_scp.midnightconfig.smileSpawnWeight.t: §8§o[?]§7§o The chance of Smiler's spawning in the world.
sf_scp.midnightconfig.smileSpawnMinGroup: §8§o[?]§7§o The minimum number of Smiler's that can spawn in a group.
sf_scp.midnightconfig.smileSpawnMaxGroup: §8§o[?]§7§o The maximum number of Smiler's that can spawn in a group.
